title: Pro Trader Peter Brandt Says Bitcoin Halving ‘Will Be a Non-Event’
description: Veteran trader Peter Brandt has said the upcoming bitcoin halving in 2024 and the “inevitable” approval of a Bitcoin ETF by the U.S. are likely to be non-events. Brandt claimed that while the top cryptocurrency’s correlation to other markets is a non-starter, bitcoin’s position on “top of [the] food chain” is the only thing that […]

title: Arizona State Law School Adopts AI Tool ChatGPT for Students Admissions
description: In a noteworthy deviation from the current trend, Arizona State University’s Sandra Day O’Connor College of Law has made a groundbreaking announcement, embracing the use of AI tools in the student application process. According to a report by Reuters, prospective law students are now permitted to leverage AI tools, specifically OpenAI’s ChatGPT, to aid in ... Read more

title: LeetSwap pauses trading as hackers allegedly siphon over $630k in ETH
description: Due to potential security breaches, the decentralized cryptocurrency exchange, LeetSwap, temporarily suspended its trading operations on August 1st. The suspension comes from suspicions that hackers infiltrated the exchange’s liquidity pools. To tackle the situation, LeetSwap revealed on Twitter that it is collaborating with on-chain security experts. This partnership aims to retrieve the funds currently frozen ... Read more

title: Elon Musk Gets Invited to Shibarium Mainnet Launch: Is His Support for Shiba Inu Poised to Eliminate Zeros for SHIB and Reach $0.01?
description: Lead developer Shytoshi Kusama has invited Elon Musk to the Shibarium mainnet launch at the Blockchain Futuristic Conference. Shibarium beta PuppyNet has achieved significant milestones recording 25 million transactions within months of launch. title: Key Traders Aggressively Accumulating Litecoin Ahead of LTC’s Halving Event: Analytics Firm Santiment
description:
A leading analytics firm says a certain class of crypto traders is rapidly accumulating the peer-to-peer payments network Litecoin (LTC) in anticipation of its upcoming halving event. Santiment says that Litecoin dolphins and sharks have accumulated 205,400 LTC worth nearly $19 million since June 14th. According to the analytics firm, the mid-tier holders are loading […]

The post Key Traders Aggressively Accumulating Litecoin Ahead of LTC’s Halving Event: Analytics Firm Santiment appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
